version_description:
- Fixed Bugs
- Added Hijri Date To The Moon Widget

- Getting prayer times settings from our servers for more accurate prayer times
- Zero configuration when add location
- Support apple watch 2.0 with prayer times complications
- Full support with the latest iOS
- Fixed bugs

- Support apple watch 2.1 with prayer times complications
- Support apple watch Arabic language
- Fixed bugs

- Support apple watch 2.1 with prayer times complications
- Support apple watch Arabic language
- Fixed bugs

* New Azan Notification Sounds
* Fixed Bugs
* Special Price For Ramadan

* New azan notification sound
* Fixed bugs related to the apple watch app
* Users now can give permission to use location only when using the app
* Special price for ramadan

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

* Bring back the Advanced Widget
* Now you can add your city via map even if dose not exist on our database
* Fixed crash on watch app

* Bring back the Advanced Widget
* Now you can add your city via map even if dose not exist on our database
